other_tests.findings: Multiple stones within the gallbladder including a 13-mm stone at the gallbladder neck; slight gallbladder wall edema; no hyperemia in the surrounding liver parenchyma; no filling defects within the CBD; no intrahepatic biliary ductal dilatation; slight fatty infiltration of the liver; normal hepatic vasculature; normal spleen, kidneys, adrenals, pancreas; normal aorta and mesenteric branches; no free fluid or adenopathy; normal bone marrow signal.
